Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Reservoir fluid level sensor failure. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 11/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
